next.excerpt:
I see a lot of people asking basic questions about calls on just about every
thread that mentions them. So here you go.

Note: before the finance majors come out and nitpick small things, remember that
this is a basic primer for idiots; some of it has been simplified.

WHAT IS A CALL OPTION:…
next.title: I teach high school, which means I explain things to idiots every day. If you still don't understand call options, I got you.

localize.title: 我在高中教书，这意味着我每天都在给白痴解释事情。如果你还是不懂期权，那我就抓住你了 If you still don't understand call options, I got you.
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我看到很多人问了很多关于电话的基本问题，几乎每一个
提到他们的线程。所以在这里，你就可以了。

注意：在金融专业的同学出来挑剔小事之前，请记住
这是为白痴提供的基本入门知识，其中一些内容已被简化。

什么是呼叫选项：...

localize.title: 我在高中教書，這意味着我每天都在給白癡解釋事情。如果你還是不懂期權，那我就抓住你了 If you still don't understand call options, I got you.
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我看到很多人問了很多關於電話的基本問題，幾乎每一個
提到他們的線程。所以在這裏，你就可以了。
